channel.title: .NET Standard on Jonathan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in .NET Standard on Jonathan's Blog

item.title: .NET Platform Standard and the magic of "imports"
item.description: In case you missed it, .NET Core RC2 has been released by Microsoft last week along with ASP.NET Core RC2 and a preview of the tooling. Lots of exciting new stuff that I highly encourage checking out. Now that RC2 is out there I guess a lot more people will be checking it out and playing with it and there’s one topic that seems to confuse a lot of people. So I thought I’d write a blog about it to clear things up a bit.
